amendatorysection.catchline: Personal injury or death; situations for which compensation is permitted; natural disaster; distribution authorized.
amendatorysection.para: The committee or hearing officer may order:

(a) An attempt on the part of the applicant to prevent the commission of crime, to apprehend a suspected criminal, to aid or attempt to aid a police officer in the performance of his or her duties, or to aid a victim of a crime; or
(b) The commission or attempt on the part of one other than the applicant of an unlawful criminal act committed or attempted in the State of Nebraska; or
(2) A distribution from the Community Trust for loss resulting from a natural disaster.
